text.content:
Caved Skull

Triple damage. Crit Effect: The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] or die.

Bludgeoning

Overreaction

Normal damage. The target triggers reactions as if it just used a move action. It is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Paper Cut

The target takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls]{-2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls} until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Unnatural Selection

Triple damage to aberrations, celestials, fiends, and monitors. Double damage to all other creatures.

Bomb or Spell
